title: Developer submits plans for data center near Long's Park
description: Plans for the data center next to Long’s Park at a former LSC Communications printing plant site have been submitted to the Lancaster city planning commission for approval.
content:
Plans for the data center next to Longs Park at a former LSC Communications printing plant site have been submitted to the Lancaster city planning commission for approval.
